projects.title: Wheather App
projects.description: A blended e-learning solution that attempts to solve the difficulties in current oracy (speaking and listening skills) strategies in primary schools across Wales. The project was developed in conjunction with a member of the education industry. What is delivered is a Laravel/Symfony full-stack application to provide the tools necessary for teachers to record and provide feedback on a range of activities. Activities are then carried out by pupils in the classroom with an iOS application for the iPad.

projects.title: Recipe Shear Website
projects.description: Using PolitiFact data, this a simple react application which aims to test your ability to identify which of two news articles is fake and real. Loading may take some time due to using a free-tier dyno in Heroku.

projects.title: IOS Lottery App
projects.description: I wanted to see if I could develop Tetris (using the official rule book) using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Loading may take some time due to using a free-tier dyno in Heroku.

projects.title: Personalised License Plate Management System
projects.description: A full-stack application created for the Web Services and Web Development joint assignment. Uses Spring for the back-end, react for the front-end, and MySQL for the database including Redis for NoSQL caching. Entirely wrapped in docker containers.

projects.title: What Does Ja Rule Think?: A Magic 8-Ball Tool
projects.description: A simple magic 8-ball style game where you ask Ja Rule his thoughts, and he shall answer. Created with React.JS and deployed using AWS Amplify.

projects.title: Harmoforce; the Microservice and Front-End
projects.description: Harmoforce is a community driven coordinator of validation staking on the Harmony ONE network. This is a microservice which keeps track and records delegators for a given target validator for easier insight into the effective staking pool of Harmoforce. Website created with React.js and deployed via AWS Amplify. Microservice exists as a Python AWS Lambda along with DynamoDB for storage.

education.title: Advance Diploma

icons.title: Full-Stack Web Development
icons.description: I have skills and experience to develop full-stack web applications and services in a variety of technologies. My knowledge area for full-stack apps include HTML/CSS/JS, Java (+ Spring Framework), NodeJS (+ Express), Serverless (+ AWS Lambda), PHP (+ Laravel/Symfony), React (+ Redux), and Ruby on Rails. I'm able to create and maintain APIs, web servers, and dockerised environments.

icons.title: Database Systems
icons.description: I have a detailed level of understanding relational database management systems. I have experience with normalisation and a wide range of SQL languages, most notably MySQL/MariaDB, and NoSQL such as MongoDB and Redis. I also have the know-how to implement and use databases in software applications and RESTful APIs.

icons.title: E-Commerce
icons.description: I have knowledge in business and have experience with developing an e-commerce site. The Business and Web module I undertook involved responsive web design through CSS frameworks, CMS such as Wordpress, and marketing include social media, email, and blogging.

icons.title: Data Science
icons.description: I understand the difference between traditional and big data and big data strategies (aims, policies, plans, actions). I know how you're able to extract value (useful analysis) from large volumes of data from many data sources. I have experience with working with Apache Hadoop.

icons.title: Project Management
icons.description: Through project management modules in education and working in an agile environment, I have experience with working with project planning. I'm able to work in Agile methodologies such as SCRUM with the inclusion of DevOps, Continuous Testing/Delivery, and Kanban Boards.

icons.title: Networking
icons.description: From routing and switching to wide area networks, I understand networking theory and the application of networks. Various networking modules allowed me to learn from Cisco, and take part in CCNA backed exams.
